space.arim.api.config

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.config.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, space.arim.universal.util.AutoClosable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigWithLog, SimpleConfig

    public abstract class Config
extends Object
implements space.arim.universal.util.AutoClosable
    A simple helper class for SnakeYAML configurations.

    Usage: Extend this class.

    This class is not thread safe. However, synchronisation will not be practical in most applications, since it is not humanly possible to instruct a plugin to reload its config (e.g., with /plugin reload) fast enough to trigger race conditions.
    Accordingly, reloading need not be synchronised; nevertheless, it is recommended to initialise synchronously.
    Author:
    A248
